net.proteusframework.core.freemarker

Class ConfigurableTemplateExceptionHandler

  • java.lang.Object
    • net.proteusframework.core.freemarker.ConfigurableTemplateExceptionHandler
  • All Implemented Interfaces:
    freemarker.template.TemplateExceptionHandler

    public class ConfigurableTemplateExceptionHandler
extends java.lang.Object
implements freemarker.template.TemplateExceptionHandler
    Exception handler that outputs/renders the error or that logs the error based on the Environment variable "ExceptionHandler_DEBUG".
    Author:
    Russ Tennant (russ@i2rd.com)
